Uses of Interface
edu.rit.pj2.tracker.LauncherRef

  • Packages that use LauncherRef 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.

    • Uses of LauncherRef in edu.rit.pj2.tracker

      Classes in edu.rit.pj2.tracker that implement LauncherRef 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Launcher
      Class Launcher provides a Launcher object and main program for launching processes on a certain node of a cluster.
      class  LauncherSender
      Class LauncherSender provides an object for sending messages to a Launcher.
